vote.text: Amendment SA 904 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 904 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hoeven. (consideration: CR S4649; text: CR S4649) To amend the authorization amount.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 904 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hoeven.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 904 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
